title: New man on the land: tomorrows harvest
creator_credit: BMT Visuals, Massey-Ferguson Ltd and Godfrey Baseley
brief_description: Modern methods of farming have dispensed with much of the toil and drudgery often associated with agricultural labor. Shows the importance of training for young farm-workers, and of the older generation accepting a business-like approach to farm management and the use of modern techniques. What this means in human terms for one group of farmers in Britain is described when the film visits West-hide Farm in Herefordshire.
